payload.text: This query is not applicable for this account. Is there anything else I can help you with?
Centrelink schedules are generated at the beginning of each financial year and whenever amendments to a pension are made. You can locate your Centrelink schedule in your document library.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule, select 'Show me how'.
Centrelink schedules are generated at the beginning of each financial year and whenever amendments to a pension are made. You can locate your Centrelink schedule in your document library.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule, select 'Show me how'.
Centrelink schedules are generated at the beginning of each financial year and whenever amendments to a pension are made. You can locate your Centrelink schedule in your document library.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule, select 'Show me how'.
Centrelink schedules are generated at the beginning of each financial year and whenever amendments to a pension are made. You can locate a client's Centrelink schedule in their document library.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule for a pension account, select 'Show me how'.
To better help you with your query could you log in into your account and please ask me again?
One of our consultants can assist you with generating a Centrelink schedule. Please select the ‘Chat with consultant’ button.
To locate an existing Centrelink schedule, navigate to 'More' and then select 'Document library'.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule, navigate to 'More' and then select 'Centrelink schedule request'.
Please note this is only applicable to pension accounts.
To locate an existing Centrelink schedule, navigate to the client’s pension account, select 'More' and then 'Document library'.
To generate a new Centrelink schedule, navigate to the client's pension account, select 'More' and then 'Centrelink schedule request'.
